Name: Restrain
Description: Deal 1 damage. If you damage an enemy this way, also subdue it.

Name: Interrogate
Description:
Deal 1 damage.
Draw two cards and discard a card.

Name: Hassle
Description:
Deal 1 damage.
Rotate up to two cards.

Name: Enforce
Description: Deal 2 damage. Deal 4 damage instead if it is dealt to a subdued enemy.

Name: Look for Trouble
Description:
Draw an encounter card.
Deal 3 damage to up to two enemies.
